description:
The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from Nextcloud Server with your computer.

Use the desktop clients to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop.
Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are.
What's Changed
- [stable-3.17] fix(syncstatussummary): do not attempt to fetch VFS state for accounts without VFS enabled by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#8764
- [stable-3.17] Bugfix/make text entirely readable by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#8772
- [stable-3.17] fix(build): allow building on macOS Tahoe by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#8776
- [stable-3.17] fix(proxy): only clean legacy proxy settings after migrating all accounts. by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#8826
- [stable-3.17] fix(accountsettings): do not to initialize e2ee if account is disconnected. by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#8827
- [stable-3.17] fix(asyncimageresponse): fetch remote resources in the same thread as Account by @backportbot[bot] in nextcloud/desktop#8859
Full Changelog: nextcloud/desktop@v3.17.2...v3.17.3
